    DOCS > INTEGRATIONS > STITCH SAAS INTEGRATIONS

    Stitch SaaS Integrations

    With Stitch, you can consolidate data from a variety of SaaS apps and services into a single data warehouse.

    Destination & Integration Compatibility

    Some integrations may be partially or fully incompatible with some of the destinations offered by Stitch. For example: some destinations don’t support storing multiple data types in the same column. If a SaaS integration sends over a column with mixed data types, some destinations may “reject” the data.

    To see if the integrations you're using are compatible with your destination, check out the Destination & Integration Compatibility Guide.

    Current SaaS Integrations

    If you don't see what you're looking for in the list below, check out the Singer project. A simple, composable, open-source ETL standard, Singer allows you to extract data from any source. Check out the Roadmap or GitHub repo to see what's currently being worked on.

    Additionally, Stitch's Import API or Incoming Webhooks integrations can be used to extract data from sources that don't currently have a native integration.

    • Singer.io
      Get Started | Roadmap
    • Import API
      Get Started
    • Stitch Incoming Webhooks
      Get Started

    Certified Integrations

    The following integrations are Stitch Certified and officially supported by the Stitch team. Certified integrations will receive commercial support, which is a guarantee that Stitch will fix bugs and adapt to new versions of third-party APIs.

    • AdRoll
      Setup | Schema
    • Desk
      Setup | Schema
    • Facebook Ads
      Setup | Replication | Schema

      1. version 1.0 (closed beta)
      2. version GA (latest)

      Setup | Replication | Schema

    Community Integrations

    The following integrations are Community Supported and are maintained by the Singer community. Maintenance of Community integrations will be performed by the Singer community. This includes fixing bugs and adapting to new versions of third-party APIs.

    For support, visit the integration's GitHub repo (linked below) or join the Singer Slack.

    Note: Commercial Stitch support contracts are available for all Community integrations. For more info, contact the Stitch Sales team.

    • Autopilot
      Setup | Schema | Repo
    • Braintree
      Setup | Schema | Repo
    • Freshdesk
      Setup | Schema | Repo
    • GitLab
      Setup | Schema | Repo

    Don’t see your integration of choice listed here? We’d love to hear from you! Reach out to us with your suggestion.
